H0.text: Similar physical features allow a species to best survive environmental changes.

H1.text: Low mutation rate is the factor that would best allow a species to survive environmental changes.

H2.text: A small population is what would best allow a species to survive environmental changes.

H3.text: Genetic diversity best allows a species to survive environmental changes.

A4.text: The capability of the population to adapt to the changing environment will depend on the presence of the necessary genetic diversity.

A5.text: Small populations are more likely to experience the loss of diversity over time by random chance, which is an example of genetic drift.
